title: Simulation/VR-Based Self-Directed Information Management Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic information management concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Students participate in self-directed courses where they experience real-world information management scenarios in simulation/VR environments, asynchronously explore learning materials, and complete assignments

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three standard classification systems using digital document management systems
Learners can explain the five stages of digital library construction (planning-collection-processing-preservation-utilization) through VR simulations
Learners can complete information management tasks linked to team projects with over 80% accuracy using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
